About

Every great journey begins with but a single step

  • 2004 - 2008

    U.S. Army Paratrooper/Combat Engineer

    Served my country and the people of Afghanistan honorably searching for and removing IED's from some of Afghanistan's most traveled roadways.

  • 2012

    Graduated from TCNJ

    Graduated Magnum Cum Laude, from The College of New Jersey with a degree in Political Science.

  • 2013

    Urban Justice Center's Vetean's Advocacy Project

    Project manager and Veteran Advocate helping to provide free legal servcies to military community of the Greater New York area.

  • 2013 - 2015

    Volunteer Peer to Peer Mentor at Headstrong Project

    The Headstrong Project is a 501c3 providing cost & bureaucracy-free mental health treatment for Post/911 veterans.

  • 2015

    Founded Pathfinder

    Pathfinder’s mission was to build a web platform focused on aggregating reviews of veteran resources for helping veterans, military families, volunteers and donors to help them make informed decisions about services while making providers socially accountable.

  • 2017

    Code Platoon

    An intensive bootcamp that turns veterans into full-stack software developers.


  • Become
    part of
    my journey!

Pearing

A group project that included building a web-based application that allows anonymous feedback for and from programming pairing partners. The technologies used were Ruby on Rails, React, Postgresql, Heroku, and Git.

  • Client: Code Platoon
  • Date: May 2017
  • Service: Web Development
